welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marple, a charming town known for its picturesque canals and cozy cafes. We invite you to explore and discover the beauty and hospitality of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and lounges. It primarily serves European and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers for domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
